Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island, #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/72nd
ShortDescription: SB #28, #J14 & #15 buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 71st, Dorchester, 73rd and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island, #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 71st, Dorchester, 73rd and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/72nd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
